dcterms:creator: P. S. Agram
H. A. Zebker
dcterms:description: A method for representing 3D space using a regular grid approach, which is utilized for modeling the large-scale 3D area coverage scenario in UAV swarm applications.
dcterms:title: Regular grid method for 3D space representation

dcterms:creator: Z. Jia
M. Sheng
J. Li
D. Niyato
Z. Han
dcterms:description: A Poisson point process (PPP) is employed to model the distribution of ground users (GUs) in the UAV swarm coverage scenario, facilitating the simulation of user deployment.
dcterms:title: Poisson point process (PPP) for modeling GUs distribution
